    Men's Moroccan Slippers

    Shipping and Returns

    DELIVERY

    We are still working with a reduced team and following government advice on keeping our warehouse and staff safe during the pandemic.

    UK Mainland - a carriage charge of £10 applies to orders under £500 (ex VAT), carriage is free on orders above £500 (ex VAT).

    UK Highlands & Islands, Northern Ireland - carriage charge is a flat rate of £16.

    International - delivery terms are ex works and we will quote the most competitive price from our couriers based on order size.

    RETURNS

    Notification of faulty goods must be made in writing within 5 days of delivery. Goods may only be returned by formal agreement between the seller and the purchaser and on receipt of a returns number from the seller.

              Our wholesale collection of Moroccan slippers for men includes round, pointed and traditional Berber styles. The leather slippers are hand dyed to our bespoke colour palette and handcrafted by skilled babouche makers in our artisan workshop in Morocco. Comfortable and easy to wear around the home, these contemporary babouche slippers make great gifts for men and are popular all year round.
